message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, let's meet in the middle. This is my counter-offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
This is a better deal than your last one and accounts for the fact that the value is decreasing for me.
You're getting closer, but I still think I can get a better deal.
